43 class topic

59 
67  topic(iasync_client& cli, const string& name,
68  int qos=message::DFLT_QOS, bool retained=message::DFLT_RETAINED)
69  : cli_(cli), name_(name), qos_(qos), retained_(retained) {}
78  static ptr_t create(iasync_client& cli, const string& name,
79  int qos=message::DFLT_QOS,
80  bool retained=message::DFLT_RETAINED) {
81  return std::make_shared<topic>(cli, name, qos, retained);
82  }
87  iasync_client& get_client() { return cli_; }
92  const string& get_name() const { return name_; }
97  int get_qos() const { return qos_; }
102  bool get_retained() const { return retained_; }
107  void set_qos(int qos) {
108  message::validate_qos(qos);
109  qos_ = qos;
110  }
115  void set_retained(bool retained) { retained_ = retained; }
124  delivery_token_ptr publish(const void* payload, size_t n);

137  int qos, bool retained);

156  delivery_token_ptr publish(binary_ref payload, int qos, bool retained);
161  token_ptr subscribe(const subscribe_options& opts=subscribe_options());
